table.Action_x0020_Data: ChatWithExpression{\/t +getcharstringprop[1]+\, I do not have enough materials remaining in my pack to craft anything else\.}ExpressionAct{clearvar[chor]}ExpressionAct{clearvar[hearts]}ExpressionAct{clearvar[bar]}ExpressionAct{clearvar[ingot]}ExpressionAct{clearvar[the]}ExpressionAct{clearvar[tme]}ExpressionAct{clearvar[dispel]}ExpressionAct{clearvar[quills]}ExpressionAct{clearvar[keyrings]}ExpressionAct{clearvar[pdi]}ExpressionAct{clearvar[tdo]}ExpressionAct{uisetlabel[uigetcontrol[AutoCrafter, Go], Go]}ExpressionAct{clearvar[amberape]}ExpressionAct{clearvar[spitale]}ExpressionAct{clearvar[bobostout]}ExpressionAct{clearvar[zongostout]}ExpressionAct{clearvar[hunterstock]}ExpressionAct{clearvar[raouldist]}SetState{*** Main Loop ***}

ExpressionAct{setvar[selectionone, wobjectgetname[getvar[selectobjone]]]}ExpressionAct{setvar[customone, 1]}ChatWithExpression{\/t +getcharstringprop[1]+\, Apply item set to +getvar[selectionone]}SetState{*** Edit Here ***}

ExpressionAct{setvar[selectiontwo, wobjectgetname[getvar[selectobjtwo]]]}ExpressionAct{setvar[customtwo, 1]}ChatWithExpression{\/t +getcharstringprop[1]+\, To item set to +getvar[selectiontwo]}SetState{*** Edit Here ***}
